question: Hello all! So im 16 weeks now with baby #2 I cant gain weight I think its due to my gestational diabetes but my belly sure is gettin bigger. Lol. I feel like im fat on top of that I been havin sharp pains and my back hurts. I just dont like being pregnant I just want to hurry up and find out wat im havin and c the new addition
title: I feel like a house at 16 weeks
